content.question: Based on Figure 1, describe TWO pieces of evidence a researcher could use to support the claim that apicoplasts evolved from free-living, prokaryotic organisms.

frqParts.text: Based on Figure 1, describe TWO pieces of evidence a researcher could use to support the claim that apicoplasts evolved from free-living, prokaryotic organisms.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
